title: Barcelona Taking Things Too Far?
description:
The FC crew break down Barcelona's controversial summer involving Frenkie de Jong's contract drama and whether they'll be able to register their bevy of new signings. Plus, the panel previews who the favorites are to win both LaLiga and Serie A on the eve of their new campaigns and PSG make a late move for Marcus Rashford.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona's controversial summer is put under the microscope; LaLiga and Serie A season preview; Rashford linked with PSG move
